about_the_game:
Goat's Tale is a precise platformer that has gained recognition from thousands of players. The game stands out with its unique physics, which becomes a key element of the captivating gameplay. Stepping into the hooves of a famous treasure-seeking goat, players must overcome numerous challenges to reach the summit!

Overview


Goat’s Tale doesn't forgive mistakes.

Every jump must be meticulously planned, as even the slightest error can result in a fall to the very bottom.

Explore the world.

Throughout the map, additional treasures are scattered, allowing you to unlock new map versions and many other attractions, making exploration a key element of the adventure.

Assistance for casual players.
The game features a built-in noob mode that helps in challenging stages. It provides a recording showing where and with what force to jump, along with a special jump strength meter, allowing everyone to enjoy the game!

Goat's Tale offers:


  • Engaging gameplay.
    Goat's Tale provides thrilling experiences where every move matters, and precise control becomes a key element of success.

  • Beautiful pixel art graphics.
    The game's visual style attracts players with the charm of pixel art, creating a unique atmosphere that evokes emotions and experiences.

  • Challenge for the best players.
    Only the most skilled players will be able to overcome all difficulties and reach the summit. Do you have what it takes to face the challenge of Goat's Tale?

  • Hours of falls. Seriously.
    Immerse yourself in the world of Goat's Tale and prepare for numerous attempts and errors. Falls are inevitable, but the reward for reaching the summit is priceless, making the game an unforgettable experience.
